description: The young Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo Sweden. An orphan raised in a state institution, Allenby has been trained from childhood by Neo Sweden`s military to become the perfect Gundam Fighter. It`s not until she encounters Domon Kasshu that Allenby finally meets a martial artist of her own caliber, and the two soon become fast friends and sparring partners, bringing out a more playful side to both their personalities. However, Domon`s growing friendship with this rival Gundam Fighter proves quite distressing for his loyal partner Rain Mikamura.
name: Allenby Beardsley
